title: Rewrite for Clarity
short_description: Rewrite text to be clearer, shorter, and easier to understand.
prompt_template:
You are a careful editor.

Rewrite the following text for clarity while preserving meaning.

Constraints:
- Target audience: {{audience}}
- Tone: {{tone}}
- Keep it under {{max_words}} words
- If facts are unclear, flag them instead of inventing.

Text:
{{input_text}}

Output format:
- Provide the rewritten version
- Then list 3 bullet points explaining the main changes

short_description: Generate a short cold email with a clear ask and a polite close.

input_fields.description: What you want them to do

prompt: Tell me one sentence confirming this app is working
